accountSettings_accountColorSubtitle: Select from a list of unique colors
accountSettings_showAssetsSubtitle: Select which tags to show for assets in this Account
accountSettings_setBehaviorHeading: Set how you want this Account to work
accountSettings_thirdPartyDepositsSubtit: Choose who can deposit into your Account
accountSettings_loadingPrompt: This may take several seconds, please wait for completion
accountSettings_renameAccount_subtitle: Enter a new label for this Account
accountSettings_accountColor_text: Select the color for this Account
accountSettings_hideAccount_message: Hide this Account in your wallet? You can always unhide it from the main application settings.
accountSettings_thirdPartyDeposits_text: Choose if you want to allow third parties to directly deposit assets into your Account. Deposits that you approve yourself in your Radix Wallet are always accepted.
accountSettings_thirdPartyDeposits_accep: Allow third-parties to deposit any asset
accountSettings_thirdPartyDeposits_onlyK: Allow third-parties to deposit only assets this Account already holds
accountSettings_thirdPartyDeposits_denyA: This account will not be able to receive "air drops" or be used by a trusted contact to assist with account recovery.
accountSettings_thirdPartyDeposits_disca: Are you sure you want to discard changes?
accountSettings_thirdPartyDeposits_allow: Deny or allow third-party deposits of specific assets, ignoring the setting above
accountSettings_thirdPartyDeposits_addDe: Enter the badge’s resource address (starting with “reso”)
accountSettings_thirdPartyDeposits_allow: Allow certain third party depositors to deposit assets freely
accountSettings_specificAssetsDeposits_r: The asset will be removed from the deny list
The asset will be removed from the allow list
The badge will be removed from the list
The depositor will be removed from the allow list
accountSettings_specificAssetsDeposits_e: Add a specific asset by its resource address to allow all third-party deposits
Add a specific asset by its resource address to deny all third-party deposits
accountSettings_specificAssetsDeposits_a: Enter the asset’s resource address (starting with “reso”)
The following resource addresses may always be deposited to this account by third parties.
accountSettings_specificAssetsDeposits_d: The following resource addresses may never be deposited to this account by third parties.
accountSettings_specificAssetsDeposits_a: Add a specific badge by its resource address to allow all deposits from its holder.
The holder of the following badges may always deposit accounts to this account.
accountSettings_specificAssetsDeposits_m: Sorry, this Account's third-party exceptions and depositor lists are in an unknown state and cannot be viewed or edited because it was imported using only a seed phrase or Ledger. A forthcoming wallet update will enable viewing and editing of these lists.
accountSettings_showAssets_text: Asset creators can add tags to them. You can choose which tags you want to see in this Account.
accountSettings_showAssets_selectShown: Select the ones you’d like shown on all your assets.
accountSettings_hideAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to hide this account?
accountSettings_deleteAccount_message: You’re about to permanently delete this Account. Once this is done, you will not be able to recover access.
accountSettings_moveAssets_message: Before deleting this Account, choose another one to transfer your assets to.
accountSettings_moveAssets_note: The new Account must hold enough XRD to pay the transaction fee.
accountSettings_moveAssets_noAccountsWar: You don’t have any other accounts with enough XRD.
accountSettings_assetsWillBeLostWarning_: If you do not transfer your assets out of this Account, they will be lost forever.
accountSettings_cannotDeleteAccountWarni: Too many assets currently held in Account to perform deletion. Move some and try again.
accountSettings_nonTransferableAssetsWar: Some of your assets are non-transferable, and will be lost.
accountSettings_accountDeleted_message: Your Account has been permanently deleted. Your wallet settings have been updated.
